channel.title: Java/C# Programmer looking for a dev team
channel.description:
Name: Patrick Age: 17 Hours/week 30-35 Background: I have been Programming since I started with private servers(look at this account's creation date) How ever that has not been with RSPS but I would like to change that and get some experience, I will be posting a zip file with code from a c# program i made and an android app I made, this is just enough to demonstrate i know the languages, I have more code upon request send me a message if interested.
Previous work: Spanish verb Conjugation App(Java/Android): [url=http://uppit.com/it3t5u0adve6/AndroidApp.zip]http://uppit.com/it3t5u0adve6/AndroidApp.zip[/url]
Prime Number Generator (C#/Windows): [url=http://uppit.com/w7fvu7hzrxz3/PrimeNumberGen.rar]http://uppit.com/w7fvu7hzrxz3/PrimeNumberGen.rar[/url]
Contact me @ monkeypa@hotmail.com or msg me on here for my skype.

item.title: Java/C# Programmer looking for a dev team
item.dc:creator: @Mattredd9395 Mattredd9395
item.description:
@Mattredd9395 wrote:

I am looking for a Programmer. I have my own gaming website and we are currently making apps and games, etc if you are interested add me on skype thanks.

Skype: Mattredd9395

Read full topic
item.source: Java/C# Programmer looking for a dev team

item.title: Java/C# Programmer looking for a dev team
item.dc:creator: @mr_wizzard mr wizzard
item.description:
@mr_wizzard wrote:

The if statements in the android app are written nearly correct by convention, they are supposed to be written

if (condition) {
statements;
} else if (condition) {
statements;
} else if (condition) {
statements;
}

mine are written

if(condition){

statements;

}else if(condition){

statements;

}else if(condition){

statements;

}

Read full topic
item.source: Java/C# Programmer looking for a dev team

item.title: Java/C# Programmer looking for a dev team
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Learn to format your code and I don’t like those ugly if statements lol.

Edit: I only looked at the android app.

Read full topic

item.title: Java/C# Programmer looking for a dev team

item.description:
@supaz wrote:

Do you know JavaScript or are you willing to learn? I’m in the midst of programming a HTML5/JS RPG.

Add me on skype if you wish,

LoganGar
